forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Periods of rain and windy at times this morning. Thunder possible. High around 15C. S winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with intermittent light rain this morning. Clouds will linger this afternoon. Thunder possible. High around 60F. S winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain late. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 54F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Becoming windy late. Low 14C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 57F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with a steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 14C. S winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with a steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 58F. S winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady rain late. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. SSW winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 54F. SSW winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Clearing late. Low 6C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain early...then becoming clear late. Low 43F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 14C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 56F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 38F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny. High 16C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny. High 61F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 16C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 62F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 62F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 62F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 52F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 15C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
